q1.question_text: What changes have you made in your school in the last 6-12 months?

category.description: Main category of the change implemented

reasoning.description: Brief explanation for the categorization choice

categorization_criteria.instructions: Categorize the change based on its primary focus area. Consider the main intent and impact of the change.

categories.name: TEACHING_METHODS
categories.definition: Changes related to teaching approaches, pedagogical methods, lesson planning, or instructional techniques
examples: Started using group activities in class

categories.name: INFRASTRUCTURE
categories.definition: Physical changes to school facilities, buildings, resources, or materials

categories.name: COMMUNITY_ENGAGEMENT
categories.definition: Initiatives involving parents, community members, or external stakeholders

categories.name: STUDENT_ACTIVITIES
categories.definition: New programs, clubs, events, or activities for students outside regular classes

categories.name: ADMINISTRATIVE
categories.definition: Changes to administrative processes, management, or school operations

categories.name: OTHER
categories.definition: Changes that don't fit clearly into the above categories or involve multiple areas equally

q2.question_text: Where did you get the idea for these changes?

sources.description: Source(s) of inspiration for the changes (can be multiple)

categorization_criteria.instructions: Identify all sources mentioned. A response can have multiple sources.

categories.name: TRAINING/WORKSHOP
categories.definition: Ideas from formal training sessions, workshops, seminars, or professional development programs

categories.name: PEER_TEACHERS
categories.definition: Ideas shared by other teachers, colleagues, or through school visits

categories.name: ONLINE_RESOURCES
categories.definition: Ideas from internet, videos, online courses, social media, or digital platforms

categories.name: PERSONAL_INITIATIVE
categories.definition: Own ideas, observations, or innovations developed independently

categories.name: ADMINISTRATION
categories.definition: Direction or guidance from school administration, headmaster, or education officials

q3.question_text: What steps did you take to implement these changes?

categorization_criteria.instructions: Categorize based on the level of planning and structure in implementation.

categories.name: PLANNED_STRUCTURED
categories.definition: Systematic approach with clear planning, multiple steps, resource gathering, and stakeholder involvement
examples: Made a plan, gathered materials, discussed with staff, implemented in phases
Organized meeting, prepared resources, trained others

categories.name: GRADUAL_ITERATIVE
categories.definition: Step-by-step approach with learning and adjustment over time
examples: Started with one class, then expanded
Tried and adjusted based on results

categories.name: SIMPLE_DIRECT
categories.definition: Direct implementation without extensive planning or complex steps
